__e: Now, the fighters will come from their corners and toe this line.
Everyone please, please just stand in your corners and just quietly...
Why don't we just go over to his house and stand on opposite sides of the room and see which one of us he runs to?
You've travelled to the far corners of the earth for the sole purpose of bringing joy to the hearts of our men.
Until then, my work is not done.
He's been around the world dozens of times and has stared death right in the face.
But he's going to be thinking about it a great deal from now on because that is what he's lost and his search for it is going to take him into the darkest corners of the twilight zone.

Through the four corners of the land.
